message_1: Suppose you want to transmit the message "110101" using the one-time pad encryption. Your key is "011010". Encode the message using the key, and write the resulting ciphertext.
message_2:
To encode the message "110101" using the one-time pad encryption with the key "011010", we perform bitwise XOR (exclusive OR) operation between the message and the key. 

Message:  110101
Key:      011010
XOR:      101111

The resulting ciphertext is "101111".
